version_description:
1 Optimize the test algorithm to improve the test accuracy.
2 New support for the new iPad Air and iPad 10.2(2020).
3 Now you can unlock unlimited tests and remove ads by Pro Edition IAP.
4 Optimization app UI and user experience.
5 Internationalization support.

1 Optimize the test algorithm to improve the test accuracy.
2 New support for the new iPad Air and iPad 10.2(2020).
3 Now you can unlock unlimited tests and remove ads by Pro Edition IAP.
4 Optimization app UI and user experience.
5 Internationalization support.

1 New feature of automatic charging test. The power test will start automatically when the charging cable is connected. You can view related tutorials in [Tools-Automatic charging test] (iOS14 system required).
2 Now you can set battery health and actual battery capacity, the test result will be more accurate.

1 Optimize the automatic charging test, fix the occasional test failure when connected to the charging cable
2 Optimize the test algorithm to improve the accuracy of power testing
3 Fixed the bug that the app would crash caused by share app on iPad

1 New feature of charging animation, well-designed high-definition animations, reject mosaic animation
2 Optimize the test algorithm to improve the accuracy of power testing
3 The check-in points will be hidden for Pro Edition users. The app is more refreshing

1 New feature of charging animation, well-designed high-definition animations, reject mosaic animation
2 Optimize the test algorithm to improve the accuracy of power testing
3 The check-in points will be hidden for Pro Edition users. The app is more refreshing
4 Fix the status bar bug and a bug in charge animation list

1 Fix the bug that the power data is not updated in time during the charging test
2 Fix the bug of inaccurate calculation of charging percentage progress
3 Optimize the experience of starting the charging animation, remove the pop-up prompt

1 Added multiple charging animations.
2 Optimize the pop-up prompt when the animation start.
3 Improved algorithm accuracy

1 New feature of charging sound.
2 Added multiple charging animations.
3 Greatly optimize the operating experience.

1 Charging animation and automatically start will be set after buy the Pro Edition
2 Added a large number of English charging sound
3 Fix the bug that the status bar disappears on some pages
4 Greatly optimize the operating experience

1 New feature for setting custom charging play and charging wallpaper
2 New feature for importing custom charging sounds
3 Optimization algorithm accuracy

1 When the animation is playing silently, the music played by other apps will no longer be interrupted
2 After the automatic opening animation is set, the pop-up window will no longer be prompted to optimize the user experience
3 Fix the bug that the sound download fails, and add the prompt sound tutorial for charging disconnected, low battery, and full charge.
4 New feature of cropping when adding custom picture wallpapers and charging animations.
5 Fixed the bug where the actual playback speed of some animations was inconsistent with the preview playback speed

1 Fix the bug that the screen cannot follow the system locking when playing some animations
2 Fixed the bug that the charging sound played without sound in some cases

1 Added 600,000 charging animations and charging wallpapers.
2 Optimize the playback of charging animation

1 Fix the bug that some animations cannot be set
2 Optimize the playback of charging animation

1 Fix the bug that there is a small chance of trash when the charging animation starts
2 Optimize some charging animations

1 Added new three home screen widgets
2. Optimize the stability of IAP and fix the bug that IAP sometimes fails
3 New support for traditional Chinese

1 Added multiple home screen widgets
2 Optimized the power calculation algorithm

1 Added multiple home screen widgets (long press home screen to add)
2. Optimized the power calculation algorithm
3. Fix the bug that the outer ring of the battery does not display the battery correctly

1 The battery and weather widgets can now select location. You can also customize the text background color
2 Fix the bug that widget occasionally fail to load
3 Fix some small bugs
